insert.selectKey: select count(*) from hq_seo_await where url = #{url} and operate_type = #{operateType} and data_type =#{dataType}
insert.if: update hq_seo_await set mid= #{mid}, url =#{url}, data_type=#{dataType}, operate_type =#{operateType}, data_source =#{dataSource}, state=1, update_time= #{updateTime} where url = #{url} and operate_type = #{operateType} and data_type =#{dataType}

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hq_seo_await WHERE 1=1 AND state = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1500
mapper.update: update hq_seo_await set mid= #{mid}, url =#{url}, data_type=#{dataType}, operate_type =#{operateType}, data_source =#{dataSource}, state=#{state}, update_time= #{updateTime} where url = #{url} and operate_type = #{operateType} and data_type =#{dataType}
